creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: four lines of looping, but very evenly spaced, unattached characters; fifth broken line of smaller characters at far left; inverted red seal at URC; two square red seals at LLC: one relief, the other inverted
markings:
URC, red seal; LLC, two square red seals; on back, bottom edge, in pencil: [Kensai]

two red seals; 文彭and聃卿
title: Quatrain in Cursive Script
